General.Name: NexturnBioscience Co. Ltd
General.Industry: Machinery, Tools, Heavy Vehicles, Trains & Ships
General.Description: Nexturn Co.,Ltd. develops and produces CNC automatic lathe machines in Korea and internationally. It provides CNC swiss-type automatic lathe products, high temperature display glass press equipment, and automatic line-up robots, as well as an intelligent intervention robot system based on robot 3D cardiovascular visualization technology. The company was formerly known as KMT Incorporated and changed its name to Nexturn Co.,Ltd. in April 2004. Nexturn Co.,Ltd. was founded in 2000 and is based in Yongin, South Korea.
